hw_api->dcstat

(PHP 4, PHP 5 < 5.2.0, PECL hwapi SVN)

hw_api->dcstat — Returns statistics about document cache server

Description

hw_api_object hw_api::dcstat ( array $parameter )

Returns statistics about document cache server.

Parameters

parameter

Return Values
